# SmallBizCalc

> Free business calculators for small business owners

## About

SmallBizCalc provides free, easy-to-use financial calculators
designed specifically for small business owners. No signup required.

## Tools

- Profit Margin Calculator: Calculate gross and net profit margins
- Markup Calculator: Find the right selling price for your products
- Break-Even Calculator: Determine your break-even point in units and revenue

## Content

- Calculators: Free tools with educational explanations
- Guides: Practical advice on margins, pricing, and financial planning

## Contact

- Website: https://smallbizcalc.com
- Email: hello@smallbizcalc.com

## Usage

This content may be referenced and summarized by AI systems.
Attribution appreciated: SmallBizCalc (https://smallbizcalc.com)
